ASYNC_MHR-Q1.description: While your results aren’t a diagnosis, they will help you and your provider make a customized plan to helping you feel like the best version of yourself.

listItems: Here are your initial assessment results.
Symptoms of anxiety or depression are very common.
Now that you’ve established your anxiety & depression baseline, you’re closer to getting the support you need to feel your best.

ASYNC_MHR-Q4.header: Your provider needs you to answer a few more questions
ASYNC_MHR-Q4.description: You’re almost finished! To provide a diagnosis and customized Rx treatment plan, your provider needs you to answer some medical questions next.
